title: Step 22

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: You should define a new property variable called --building-color2.
You should give --building-color2 a value of #66cc99 within the .bb1 class.
You should set the background-color using the --building-color2 variable.

description: Create a new variable below your --building-color1 variable. Name your new variable --building-color2 and give it a value of #66cc99. Then set it as the background-color of .bb2.
